item.title: [PI] Character Design
item.dc:creator: @genoarch genoarch
item.description:
@genoarch wrote:

how can i get my initialize packet to check if charDesign = 1 or charDesign = 0? this is the code i have so far, i have everything else that works 100% but this isnt working too good.

if (charDesign == 0) getPA().showInterface(3559); charDesign++; canChangeAppearance = true;

EDIT: Fixed, had to add

} else if (token.equals("charDesign")) { p.charDesign = Integer.parseInt(token2);

to playerSave.java

also had to change to this to stop adding +1 to charDesign for no reason

if (charDesign == 0)[b]{[/b] getPA().showInterface(3559); charDesign++; canChangeAppearance = true; [b]} else { //donothing }[/b]

Read full topic
